title: SUGARCUBE critique
content:
[http://www.bedford.net/cate/sugarcube.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018065750/http:/www.bedford.net/cate/sugarcube.gif)   
   
Here's one of my first typefaces. Any comments will be appreciated. Thanks!
author: cate

comments.content: It works. To me, the lowercase x looks backwards and should look more like the capital X. I am particularly fond of the capital X, but it also seems a bit larger than the other capitals. I also think the lowercase w is tilted too much.
